title: Client Crashing Constantly
body:
Has anyone else been having their client crash over and over again since the last two patches. Mine mostly happen whenever I want to scroll my friends list, or look at champions, or the store, or my profile.... 



I have repaired the client multiple times and it hasn't helped.

replies.body: OOO Thanks for the reply. I'll do that next time I play. I do have Plays and Baron replay. Haven't had problems with either in the past, but I have had problems with similar programs so I don't know why it didn't cross my mind.

Crashing on the client like this can be due to a third party program that's interacting poorly with League, especially after a patch. If you have any apps running like play.tv, overwolf, lolrecover, etc remove them.  This should get you fixed up but let me know!
